summary: The Coast Guard has 11 mandated missions. To operate effectively, it must use its resources wisely while planning for and investing in future operations. We testified that the Coast Guard could do more in some areas. For instance, the Coast Guard is required to collect and report data on marine accidents and casualties to inform safety guidelines and regulations. However, it doesn't collect potentially useful...
title: Coast Guard: Actions Needed to Improve Mission Execution and Resource Management
